participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, enjoys exploring new perspectives through photography.
participant_1.background: my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures. i am an elementary school teacher. i am fluent in english, spanish, and french.
